name: Shane Barker Consulting
description:
Shane Barker Consulting (Full Proof Consulting LLC) is a boutique digital marketing firm located in Sacramento, California. It was founded by Shane Barker, a digital strategist, influencer and brand consultant. We have expertise in SEO, influencer marketing, driving traffic and conversions through lead generation.
 
Our areas of expertise include:
Developing and executing a targeted SEO campaign to increase traffic and generate leads
Product launch marketing to ensure the success of your latest product
Influencer marketing to build trust with your audience and expand your reach across the market
App store optimization to boost your app ranking and encourage downloads
Building your exposure and engagement across different social media platforms
Check our Testimonial and fill up the contact form on our website and let’s get you started with a FREE 30-minute consultation. We’ll analyze your existing strategy and help you pinpoint the area that’s costing you sales.
Work for you – You can hire us as a consulting team to work with your strong marketing team in creating an effective online strategy that will convert leads into sales.
Work with you – Don’t have the time to work on your digital marketing strategy? You can always hand over the reins to us and have us do everything you need to take your business to the next level.
With 13 years of experience in the digital marketing industry, our team can provide you with invaluable advice, feedback, and guidance to launch a marketing campaign that rocks! Want to get ahead of your competitors? Request a free quote today.
